channel.title: Logs ppl out then wont let back in, realy need help please!
channel.description: ok i made server, been up bout a week all is really good, then a few days ago it started doing this. once someone logs out they cant get back in, it says the server is offline. when i restart all is fine for about 5 mins then people cant get in even tho there are people online. this has been happening for 3 days i think and i really need help, the source is fr33sc4p3 if that helps. can any one help me please.

item.title: Logs ppl out then wont let back in, realy need help please!
item.dc:creator: @ven0m ven0m
item.description:
@ven0m wrote:

[quote=“junkyNL, post:6, topic:61560”]try to find restarter if ur source got really fast restarter, u are still logging in, but the rest can’t
or search for warnings, because some sources got for noclip warnings or ip ban (like my source)
search for bans,warnings,ip bans or restarter, hope i helpd[/quote]

restarter time is on 0 and there are about 10 people still logged in when one person cant untill i restart then evreyone can get in for abit then it happens again.
